mapper.select: select DISTINCT tagMiddleName from tag where tagMainName= #{param};

select questionNo, tagNo from questiontag where questionNo= #{param};
mapper.delete: delete from questiontag where questionNo=#{questionNo} and tagNo=#{tagNo};
mapper.select: select COALESCE( (select count(*) from memfavtag where memId = #{memId} and tagNo = #{tagNo}),0) as count;
mapper.delete: delete from memfavtag where memId = #{memId} and tagNo = #{tagNo};

mapper.insert: insert into tag (tagMainName, tagMiddleName, tagName) value (#{tagMainName}, #{tagMiddleName}, #{tagName} );
